attributes.action: Honour Sheffield Wednesday Legend  Kevin Pressman With An OBE For Services To Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kevin Pressman Gave 20 Professional years to football. 17 of those years were to Sheffield Wednesday where he played nearly 500 appearances. In his prime he was one of the best goalkeepers in the Premiership. When relegated Kevin was still a very good keeper in the championship. He was called up to the England Senior squad but was never capped, he did play at under-21 level and at the England 'B' squad.
He also played for Coventry City, Leicester City, Leeds United and most recently Mansfield Town.
He is a Goalkeeping legend!!!!!!!!!
